issue.title: Add some screenshots
issue.body: Would love to see some screenshots and see what how this looks without having to set it up myself.

issue.title: Put the Vue component into its own package
issue.body:
Branch: [feature/lerna](https://github.com/TheWispy/Hacklight/tree/feature/lerna)

We probably ought to only have the card itself as a module export, and let the user implement their own carousel if they desire.

We need to have the card exported in a way such that it can be used without webpack preferably.

issue.title: Move GitHub API request into its own package
issue.body: It should be a function that takes the topic and a GitHub API token, returns a promise with the data or throws an error message.

issue.title: Allow ability to set max number of returned results
issue.body: This would be for both component and server calls. Current carousel library seems to have a maximum of 10 already.

issue.title: Demo does not refresh properly when changing input box
issue.body: You currently have to enter a topic that doesn't exist for it to refresh, then enter your chosen topic.

issue.title: Demo does not refresh properly when changing input box
issue.body: You currently have to enter a topic that doesn't exist for it to refresh, then enter your chosen topic.

issue.title: Plan for proper use/release
issue.body:
Divide project into two packages (same repo should be fine) which can be published to NPM.

# Component

The Vue.JS component can be bundled perhaps and made available for use as a package, taking in generic repository data.

# GitHub API Call Function Thing

This can be a function that people can import and serve on their own API. They provide the function with the _topic_ and _API token_, and it returns a promise with the results!
